When I first watched this film, I was thirteen–a naive little boy captivated by this immensely entertaining three-hour flick. I didn’t really think much of this than a fun family movie about aspirations and dreams, not really minding its implications and what not. Now, I am at a mature-ish age of twenty, currently taking an engineering degree at one of the most renowned universities in my country, and revisiting this film has never been more relevant than ever. I always…

Umpteenth viewing.Words will really never be enough to explain how much this film means to me. I know every line, every word of it. In a way, both good or bad, our whole present generation of Indian teens has been raised on this film. And it still holds up fairly phenomenally well. Every joke, every gag still hits like a knife, every emotional beat still reduces me to tears, one of the sharpest Bollywood screenplays ever written. Also extremely…

Is 3 idiots a perfect movie? No, its definitely not, but I could never fully describe how much this movie means to me. Over the last couple of months, people have been pressuring me to do and be a lot of things like a professional pianist or a national badminton champion or a scientist or whatever. Out of those things I'm only really interested in singing and filmmaking but I'm scared that my parents would be dissapointed in me and…

Whether favorably or negatively, it's difficult not to have a follower, acquaintance, or friend in India with whom you talk about films and not bring this film to coalition. Which isn't surprising given its box office and critical reaction, as well as the fact that it appears on several of this platform's top lists.And I partly understand why.The cinematography, for the most part, is superb and even rather creative for a comedy, with the film frequently breaching genre…
It was necessary for me to turn to this film once again to find the solace during this chaotic time of my life.

An outstandingly directed coming of age feel good comedy drama, that is based on our exhaustive educational system and the need to follow one’s passion. Even after all these years, the movie carries tremendous repeat value and stays as fresh. The comedy works out terrifically scene after scene and the satirical handling of its theme, makes the narrative developments so effective. The friendship portions are so warmly executed and the emotional beats connect so well. Aamir Khan and Boman Irani are the show stealers, well supported by its rest of cast. An entertaining, inspiring and ridiculously fun must watch dramedy. All iz Well.

3 Idiotsis a giant mess of fun. It looks great visually and has some really catchy songs. The film is broadly a satire on education and the social pressures placed on upon students. However nothing in3 Idiotsis particularly profound. Most of its jokes and points are obvious, so its social observations are very basic. There is no subtlety. Suicide is repeatedly referred to as murder, citing the mental pressures students are placed under. While there is an…

The title of this film is completely misleading.There's only one idiot here, and that's me for sitting through all 170 minutes thinking it had to get better/funny at some point to justify its high position in the IMDB Top 250.More. Fool. Me.1.5 Asshole Heads of Department for3 Idiots.

The kind of movie I can show to a new date or friend, that encompasses who I am, what excites me and how I view the world.3 Idiotsshowcases my love of creativity and classic storytelling. It's silly, but not without jarring moments of seriousness. It brilliantly juxtaposes cartoonish comedy with dark undertones of the human condition as well as the societal pressures of excelling in a highly competitive world.This movie understands me and pretty much a lot…

One of the most popular Indian movies of all time, Rajkumar Hirani’s classic buddy comedy is a definitely a fun ride. Underneath it all is a story about refusing to be put in the box others try to force you into, surrounded by a raucous and entertaining romp that mixes all sorts of tones in.Hirani can focus on all the antics and hijinx, but there’s a genuine message here. While set at a particular college, it’s all pretty universal…

Reviewing this film presents a challenge for me, as my exposure to Indian cinema is limited, having watched only a handful of Indian films. While I lack the expertise to gauge its excellence within the spectrum of Indian cinema, I found "3 Idiots" to be a captivating experience.Clocking in at nearly three hours, the film's lengthy runtime might deter some viewers. However, in the case of "3 Idiots," the duration feels justified by its compelling narrative. Much like other…

In a world full of questionable systems, it's really hard to live how we want. Are we living the way we want or the way society wants? Generalizing one's experience is shit, just because you can do it, doesn't mean others can. Passion in this film is everything, but we know that can't be with other people. But this still gives us hope anyways.I love watching films that will make me question about the world and how I should live my life. All is well!

Film #1 Of TheMay 30 Days, 30 Countries Challenge- IndiaAs a rule, I try to grade on my subjective experience of a movie, not on my (also subjective) perspective of a movie's objective quality. So no, this is not the masterpiece I typically reserve 5 stars for - you might have gathered as much from the poster. It is, however, the most impassioned treatment of a theme close to my heart - whether to follow passion or…

Aal Izz Well!A rollercoaster ride of friendship, exams, and chasing dreams, and making the professors scratch their heads.Beneath the humor, 3 Idiots tackles the pressures of societal expectations and the pursuit of true passion, delivering thought-provoking messages with a light touch.Aamir Khan's brilliant portrayal of the rebellious and idealistic Rancho is both endearing and inspiring, ideal to say the least. Most quotable film ever. The other performances in this film are top notch as well.And all…

My first Bollywood and it was loads of fun. Solid themes about education methods and extreme pressure on young students to be what their parents and society want them to be. Typical engineering students though - it seems they're the same the world over - always pulling down their pants and making people look at their butts.

Find yourself some bros willing to dangle cremated ashes over a toilet for you.A charming story about friendship that reimagines Ferris Bueller's Day Off and Dead Poets Society with an Indian cultural twist - three friends meet at engineering school and get caught up in a new sense of liberation, rebelling against their stuffy teacher and exploring their own personalities in the process. The story blends comedy and drama together in a way that actually builds the trio's relationship,…

All is well.Not remotely a perfect movie, goes on way too long, and a decent amount of the comedy doesn't work very well, but dammit, it won me over by the end. From the outside, 3 Idiots looks to be an Indian version of an American college comedy. Well, it kind of is, but then it's also so many other things. It's also a drama, but with musical numbers, that shows us not to forget we are all merely human and the things we strive for are not always best for us.It's all very well made and mapped out perfectly. You know there is a twist coming and you can see the moral lesson a mile away, but if this movie teaches anything, don't sweat it and enjoy the ride.All is well.
I’ve been watching this on-and-off for a couple of months now… I have no clue how this ended up on the IMDb 250.
If you can pass the first hour you are in for a masterpiece of emotion and screenwriting, perhaps a little over the top is it's only fault past that.

It's just a ridiculously likeable film. Doesn't take itself too seriously, but has some genuinely touching moments amidst the farce, and some pretty important things to say about the Indian education system and social hierarchies.You've got to be made of steel if this doesn't bring a smile to your face. Zoobi Doobi Zoobi Doobi.

Wow! What a good movie! At first I thought of stopping it! Its a little rusty at the beginning but once you get on the flow it moves steadily and continuously great! Strong and inspiring! 3 idiots is 3 hours worth watching! Never stops surprising you!

It’s a really great movie! It’s extremely entertaining yet has many emotional moments and powerful messages. It’s my first Bollywood movie which was very interesting. i didn't expect it to be a musical, and certainly didn't expect it to be 3 hours long.

A coming of age comedy that's non stop full of energy and life, it's nearly three hours but there's so much stuff happening including musical numbers, comedy sequences and over the top characters that the time flies by. Its a bit silly but it's part of its charm and has a story about following dreams and not being boxed in or stopped in your passion by society or family.

I went into this with low expectations. I imagined the IMDb rating was artificially inflated. Based on the name and the poster, I figured this was some sort of 3-hour Farrell Brothers movie.It is so much smarter, romantic, and moving - and still is funny too!Having seen this andDangal, I now have an idea why Aamir Khan is the biggest movie star in the world.

If a movie is pretty good along the way but it goes on for nearly 3 hours, is it some kind of healthy stockholm syndrome that you find yourself loving it by the end even when you can tell the movie doesn't totally earn that reaction? Does it matter?Let's say no and just add me to those who have celebrated "3 Idiots" over the years as a wonderful Indian opus of friendship, college capers, love, education, wisdom, true success…

My first real Bollywood movie. I'm working my way through the last of IMDb's top 250 since most of my remaining films are now on Netflix. It was less dopey than I expected. Very sweet, if sloppy. That's more or less my expected reaction to most of the remaining Indian dramedies I have to see.

This movie really took me by surprise.Even though it's a long movie I felt it went by so quickly. I loved the characters and the three leading men had a really great chemistry so the friendship seemed so real and heartfelt.The story was sweet and emotional and I liked the songs.I highly recommend this movie.Also this was my first Bollywood movie ever. I have to watch more.

Aal Izz WellSo, it does still feel the same after how many years since I've watched it. Despite the fact that sight gags like ragging, exaggerated stereotypes amongst the characters, and college students’ struggles being marketed as “funny” don't quite hold up. But my, oh my, the urge to challenge the conventions of the educational system.3 Idiots(2009) is a wily tearjerker of a drama, comedy, and musical all at once, dominated by plotline after plotline that hardly loses the heart of its social significance.

iMDB Top 250 #214So this was my first Bollywood film. For me, this movie was either 1 or 100 at all times. And by that I mean it was either trying to be really funny or really emotional, going back and forth between the two, and it didn't take. It was all over the place, and I didn't know whether to treat it as a slapstick comedy or a soppy drama.If I was to treat it like a…

Hadn't seen this in ages so it was like watching it for the first time only because I only remembered the major plot developments and nothing else. I laughed the same at every joke and cried the same at every emotional moment.All I can say is, this is ourDead Poets Society.
